about.title: Professional Summary
about.description: Experienced developer with 4+ years of expertise in both frontend and backend web development. Specialized in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP and platforms including Shopify and WordPress. Proven track record in creating intuitive user interfaces, integrating APIs, and building robust web applications. Currently focused on backend development using PHP and CakePHP. Advanced knowledge in business process automation with n8n.
